trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound"> </xref> eventos de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated> event is raised when an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is created.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated>evento é gerado quando um item de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>controle é criado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound> event is raised when an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is data bound to a source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound>evento é gerado quando um item de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>controle está associados a uma fonte de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound>

trans-unit.source: When you create a DataListItemEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um delegado DataListItemEventHandler, identifica o método que manipulará o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [NIB: eventos e delegados](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
